title: Application Insights Workbooks Index
description: Catalog of Application Insights workbooks for version control and automated export

workbooks.name: Movement Navigation Overview
workbooks.description: Unified dashboard combining movement success rate & blocked reason analytics. Provides single pane of glass to monitor traversal health, friction sources, and trends.

workbooks.name: Performance Operations Dashboard
workbooks.description: Consolidated workbook for Gremlin operation performance monitoring: RU consumption, latency percentiles, partition pressure trends, and operation success/failure rates.
panels: Operation Success/Failure Rate & RU Cost Table

workbooks.name: Dual Persistence Monitoring Dashboard
workbooks.description: (Removed) Historical dual persistence dashboard removed post ADR-004; player storage now SQL-only.
panels: Average Latency by Operation (SQL vs Gremlin)

notes.idPlaceholders: Workbook IDs are Azure resource identifiers. Replace 'placeholder-*' values with actual workbook resource IDs from Azure Portal.
notes.consolidatedFlag: When true, indicates this workbook combines multiple related metrics rather than being a single-purpose dashboard.
notes.exportProcess: Use scripts/observability/export-workbooks.mjs to export current workbook definitions to docs/observability/workbooks/<slug>.workbook.json
